Third-Party software:

SDL2-2.0.3
	development package for SDL used to build projects that use SDL.
	Use includes from /include and libs /lib. Runtime dll is SDL.dll in /lib.

SDL2-2.0.3_source
	source to build the lib and dll in folder SDL2-2.0.3.
	Requires DirectX SDK June 2010 to build (see 
	https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=6812 ). 
	If the DirectX SDK errors with error code "S1023",
	make sure to uninstall any installed Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable packages from 
	your machine (see https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2728613 ).
